name: Mondays: a Sisyphean Typing Game
description:
YOU'RE HIRED! Type emails to earn money
to type more emails to earn more money.

An absurdist typing game where you write out randomly generated emails in an effort to reach the peak.

Max Robins - programming
Alex Robins - writing and art
Developed as part of the Briefs series,
a gold extra project with additional support by Strange Scaffold.
https://goldextra.com/briefs-a-microgames-series
http://strangescaffold.com/
